channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fisker owners get help with recall repairs as court approves liquidation plan
item.description: Fisker’s plan to liquidate its assets has been accepted by the bankruptcy court in Delaware. And with it, the issue of who should pay for labor costs ...

item.title: Apple debuts new business tools for managing presence across email, calls, and Tap to Pay
item.description: Apple on Wednesday announced an expanded series of tools that will allow businesses to increase their visibility on Apple’s platforms via its free ser...

item.title: Best iPad to Buy (and Some to Avoid) in 2024
item.description: New iPads are here. We break down Apple’s current lineup to help you figure out which one of Apple’s tablets is best for you.

item.title: This Week in AI: AWS loses a top AI exec
item.description: Hiya, folks, welcome to TechCrunch’s regular AI newsletter. If you want this in your inbox every Wednesday, sign up here. Last week, AWS lost a top AI...

item.title: GM partners with startup Forge Nano to improve EV battery life, performance, and safety
item.description: General Motors is working with Forge Nano, a materials science startup, to find new ways to enhance the performance and lifetime of electric vehicle b...

item.title: JD Vance Adviser Posted on Reddit for Years About Use of Cocaine, ‘Gas Station Heroin,’ Other Drugs
item.description: Aaron Kofsky, JD Vance’s financial policy adviser, called Vance “a Trump boot licker” and instructed users on how to transport drugs through TSA in th...

item.title: After selling Drift, ex-HubSpot exec launches AI for customer success managers
item.description: Elias Torres has achieved a lot for somebody who immigrated to the US from Nicaragua at 17 without knowing any English. He served as a VP of engineeri...

item.title: After Hurricane Milton, Get Ready for Mold
item.description: Thousands may now be at risk of mold-related illnesses following this year's hurricanes in the American South.

item.title: Inside the Mind of an AI Girlfriend (or Boyfriend)
item.description: Dippy, a startup that offers “uncensored” AI companions, lets you peer into their thought process—sometimes revealing hidden motives.

item.title: Hacker Charged With Seeking to Kill Using Cyberattacks on Hospitals
